name: When Sword Sinks Into Flowers
description:
---Long long ago, there were magicians living in this country---

Ford Gillia Kingdom, where the ancient magicians' legend still remains.
On a certain day Adelite, belonging to the kingdom's chivalric order was
cast a death-promising curse by a man who identifies himself as a "magician".
The feud between knights and magicians is beyond epochs...

Genre: AVG (ADV), R18
Otome (Maiden) Adventure Game, Western Fantasy Setting

3 characters are the conquest of your love.
18 still images


Adelite Diondale
One of the captains of the Knights of the Kingdom of Fordgilia.
She has a masculine personality, but she looks good. A popular person who is admired by his colleagues and the public.
According to him, he wanted to be born a man.

Fel Crossy
Knights of Ford Gillia Kingdom
One of Adelight's troops.
He admires the captain, Adelight, and listens to everything he says.
Considered young for his age, he is despised by his colleagues.
The person who is aware of this is always unconfident and modest.

Euphia Rangledon
Same age as Adelight.
One of the captains of the Knights of the Kingdom of Fordgillia, and the main character's rival.
Like the main character's household, he inherits the blood of a knight.
Because he is slightly inferior to the main character in swordsmanship, he is always frustrated and hits hard.

marlowe
Wizard
A member of a magician family who hates the Kingdom of Fordgilia and knights.
Her ability as a magician is very high, and her knowledge and skills are impeccable.
In terms of personality, he has a lazy habit that stands out.

The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny.
Bring happiness to his beloved and many others.
Visual novel.
This game can be played with only a mouse.

An OpenGL compatible graphics card is highly recommended.
(Without it, the game will run very poorly.)
